item.title: US Stocks Picked
item.description: TGTX (TG Therapeutics, Inc.) Small TG Therapeutics, Inc. shows significant potential for growth in the biotech industry, with a diverse product pipeline and recent acquisition agreements. However, recent insider sales and potential market risks should be monitored closely. FHN (First Horizon Corporation) Small First Horizon Corp shows potential for a strong quarterly report, but potential Fed rate cuts and economic slowdown present some risks to consider
